content: cute mittens to keep the small hands warm perfect for mixing the colours just the way you want **sizes ** 0-2 2-6 6-12 month **circumference ** 12 14 16 cm / 4 7 5 5 6 3 **length ** 7 8 8 5 cm / 2 8 3 1 3 3 **yarn ** imagine soft merino 50g / colour **gauge ** 22 sts = 10 cm /4 **needles ** 4 mm us6 cable needle for magic loop 3 5 mm us4 for rib **notions ** tapestry needle knitted from the top down the ribbing is folded dubble to make them stay at your babys hand better the pattern is written for magic loop but you can of course use dubble pointed needles if you prefere them
